text: Posts: 1,642 Christian fundamentalists plot against the Constitution: What Kim Daviss... Holy shit. For you guys who want to sift through a woman's email inbox looking for crazy shit, check this out. This loser is seriously crazy. Scary stuff. Thanks from Camelot and Hollywood
